# Service接口定义与实现

# 基础

Service的写法也与之前的写法大差不差。

public interface IDemoService{
    
    String demo();
}

@Service
public class DemoServiceImpl extends BaseService implements IDemoService{

    @Override
    public String demo(){
        return "demo";
    }
    
}

# 进阶

# 日志打印

写入必要的日志，实现io.gitee.define.service.ILogger接口即可


@Service
public class DemoServiceImpl extends BaseService implements IDemoService,ILogger{

    @Override
    public String demo(){
        log.info("demo");
        return "demo";
    }
    
}
